divs: Sighting DetailsIt dimmed and got brighter, it looked like it was as high as a plane but it just hovered there. I went inside after looking at it for ten minutes (lol) and ten minutes later, it was gone.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Langhorne
There were no other sightings in Langhorne on or around January 28th 2012
Summary: UFO hovering in the sky for about 15 minutes
